name: places/ChIJVX8PGwH2wokRdDToDJBprSk
formattedAddress: 334 E 109th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 334 E 109th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: Wasted $25 on a car wash, these guys don't wipe down anything inside the car and barely dry the outside. I didn't have time to wait and point out the issues. So hopefully they take note.

text.text: Wasted $25 on a car wash, these guys don't wipe down anything inside the car and barely dry the outside. I didn't have time to wait and point out the issues. So hopefully they take note.

originalText.text: I've been going there for years. Always fast and good service. I've done several oil changes here BUT THIS IS MY LAST ONE The damage inflicted to my $85,000 Mercedes-Benz is crazy during the oil change the proper screws were not put back on the car and at over 70 mph on the Palisades parkway the whole bottom of the car decides to come down and is dragged for over 50 mi The car became undrivable and had to be sent to a reputable place and I was charged $175 for the oil change The repairs will be over $800 and even the oil change was done wrong apparently all those places good for is washing cars do not bring an important car or imported car to have them touch it because they don't know what they're doing and could cause and did major damage some could be even life-changing

originalText.text: Could be a better service with wiping down the water after washing, but they crew is fast and the prices are better than the competition in Manhattan, the distance between two plays a role in the $$$. I have been here multiple times. I would recommend it, you get what you pay for, there are many options for your budget to consider.

text.text: Could be a better service with wiping down the water after washing, but they crew is fast and the prices are better than the competition in Manhattan, the distance between two plays a role in the $$$. I have been here multiple times. I would recommend it, you get what you pay for, there are many options for your budget to consider.

originalText.text: They did an excellent work on my car. I had gone to another detailing place and paid about the same or more amount but was not satisfied at all. Very professional and flexible. It was worth the price.

text.text: They did an excellent work on my car. I had gone to another detailing place and paid about the same or more amount but was not satisfied at all. Very professional and flexible. It was worth the price.

originalText.text: Went to this car wash first time. Car was not very dorty. Took the 24.99 super wash which supposedly included undercarriage cleaning, polish and tyre polish. They did a very poor job. Bird poop was still stuck on the trunk and windscreen when they handed the car to me. Did not wipe the water down. side skirts did had dirt on it. Did not even clean the sideview mirrors with water marks on them. Disappointed. They just drove the car out of the wash to the corner and told literally in 3 minutes that it is done. I had to point every spot to make them clean it. Only positive thing is that it was quick.
